origination.translation[0].definitions[0: the process of arranging and supplying a loan, especially a MORTGAGE (=loan for buying a house)
the loan origination and funding functions of banks
origination.translation[0].definitions[1: the work involved in making something from the beginning through to the finished product
How efficiently can our organization implement an idea from origination to commercialization?
The group incurred heavyorigination costs in developing its video catalogue.
